bike.description: Globe A1 Premium Aluminum, integrated headset, forged drop outs, kickstand mount under BB

components.description: Globe 700c straight-blade aluminum fork w/ custom forged crown and porteur basket/rack system
1 1/8" threadless,  integrated, semi-cartridge campy style bearings
Alloy Commuter Bar, 25.4mm, 610mm wide, 43 deg up, 57 deg back sweep
Forged alloy arm w/ 42t steel chainring
Cartridge bearing, square spindle w/ crank stop right side, capless bolts
Globe 700c, double wall, pin joint, 36h w/CNC side wall
Forged alloy, double sealed, ground race, QR
Specialized Infinity 700x32c, 60TPI, w/ Flak Jacket protection
Specialized Infinity 700x32c, 60TPI, w/ Flak Jacket protection
Globe forged alloy extra slim clamp, 31.8mm
Globe aluminum chain guard for internal gearing
Globe portieur front rack/basket w/ alloy bottom, 25Kg max load
Globe steel fenders, extra long, 700c x 35c wide
